ygData.subject: Ok im alittle upset
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow ShadowKnights, Well I finally hit level 22 and ran to get my new spells. First off maybe I have real bad luck but I couldnt cast convoke shadow to
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow ShadowKnights,

Well I finally hit level 22 and ran to get my new spells. First off
maybe I have real bad luck but I couldnt cast convoke shadow to save my
life! I burnt up 20 bonechips and got no pet. Ok so I move on to my next new
fav. spell I was looking foward to Engulfing Darkness. I casted this spell
on myself alot of times and it only lasted for a few sec. I really dont see
me catching any mob like I could with clinging darkness it just wears off
WAY to fast and it did about 30dmg total time it was on. I petitioned that
one and the guy told me they did do a big change to those series of darkness
spells so he noted it to be checked out. Now for Vampiric embrace I only
tested this spell fighting rats and stuff but in the whole time fighting I
never did the random lifetap they put in. Either I need to fight stronger
stuff or they got the random lifetap to like 20% chance of success :- / .
The only spells im happy to be using so far is Deadeye and Ward Undead(which
im still practicing and failing alot).

Trian Soulreaper
Cazic Thule
